LocaleResource.Name: AdminSearch.Fields.SearchInCustomers.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Searches by customer email and username.

LocaleResource.Name: AdminSearch.Fields.SearchInOrders.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Searches by order number, should be integer.

LocaleResource.Name: AdminSearch.Fields.MinSearchTermLength.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Minimum number of characters required to perform search for inputed phrase.

LocaleResource.Name: AdminSearch.Fields.MaxSearchResultsCount.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Number of maximum search results to show in result box. Shouldn't be greater than 100.

LocaleResource.Name: AdminSearch.Fields.ProductsDisplayOrder.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Display order of results for this search, e.g. if you want found categories to be shown before products, set 0 for categories and 1 for products.

LocaleResource.Value: Display order of results for this search, e.g. if you want found categories to be shown before products, set 0 for categories and 1 for products.

LocaleResource.Value: Display order of results for this search, e.g. if you want found categories to be shown before products, set 0 for categories and 1 for products.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.System.Roslyn.Disabled
LocaleResource.Value: Compilation of files ctx are disabled.

LocaleResource.Name: AdminSearch.Fields.SearchInMenu.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Searches in left side menu items.

LocaleResource.Name: AdminSearch.Fields.MenuDisplayOrder
LocaleResource.Value: Display order of results for this search, e.g. if you want found categories to be shown before products, set 0 for categories and 1 for products.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Catalog.AskQuestionOnProduct
LocaleResource.Value: 'Ask question on the product page' enabled

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Catalog.AskQuestionOnProduct.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to allow customers to use the 'Ask question on the product page' option in your store

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.ContentManagement.Knowledgebase.KnowledgebaseArticle.Fields.AllowComments.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: When checked, customers can leave comments about your article.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Knowledgebase.AllowNotRegisteredUsersToLeaveComments
LocaleResource.Value: Allow not registered users to leave comments

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Knowledgebase.AllowNotRegisteredUsersToLeaveComments.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to allow not registered users to leave comments.

LocaleResource.Name: Knowledgebase.Article.Comments.OnlyRegisteredUsersLeaveComments
LocaleResource.Value: Only registered users can leave comments.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Knowledgebase.NotifyAboutNewArticleComments.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to notify store owner about new article comments.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.CaptchaShowOnArticleCommentPage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to show CAPTCHA on article page when writing a comment.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Catalog.PersonalizedProductsEnabled.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to allow customers to use the 'Personalized products' feature in your store

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Catalog.PersonalizedProductsNumber.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The number of 'Personalized products' to display when 'Personalized products' option is enabled.
